scripts.build:gleam: gleam build && cd src/lustre && find . -type f -iname "*.mjs" -ls -exec ditto {} ../../build/dev/javascript/lustre/dist/lustre/{} \; && cd ../../
scripts.build: npm run build:gleam && parcel build src/index.html
scripts.start: npm run build:gleam && concurrently --kill-others "chokidar src/lustre/* -c \"npm run build:gleam\"" "parcel src/index.html"
